mathCurriculum.title: Basic Mathematics
mathCurriculum.description: Fundamental mathematical concepts and operations that form the foundation for more advanced topics.

mathCurriculum.title: Algebra
mathCurriculum.description: Study of mathematical symbols and the rules for manipulating these symbols, which is a fundamental part of higher mathematics.

mathCurriculum.title: Geometry
mathCurriculum.description: Study of shapes, sizes, and positions of figures, as well as the properties of space.

mathCurriculum.title: Trigonometry
mathCurriculum.description: Study of relationships between side lengths and angles of triangles, with applications in various fields.

mathCurriculum.title: Calculus
mathCurriculum.description: Study of continuous change, covering concepts of limits, derivatives, integrals, and their applications.
